title: R3BIRTH R3VOLUTION
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Alright, today, let’s deliver our most amazing performance yet!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes. I can’t help but smile when I think about being able to spread happiness again like yesterday.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I want to hurry up and stand on stage and wow the audience with my performance.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Your performance yesterday was awesome, Mia! It made my heart pound!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I was impressed, too. But today, I’m going to deliver the most excitement to the audience!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Then I’m gonna give it everything I got and tear up the stage.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>I won’t lose either! You’re going to be totally captivated by my performance!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Well, everyone, let’s gather our feelings and express them through our performances today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Alright, let’s show everyone our strongest performance!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Yeah! We’re going to revolutionize everyone’s hearts!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
